name: Fuzzy Jacket
description: a poofy and comfortable winter jacket, just your size!

target_responses.break: You tear at the jacket, but it must have been made by valiant manufacturers- you can't seem to do any damage.

state_responses.on: The jacket smells a little musky as you don it, but it should keep you very warm
state_responses.off: You take the jacket off, revealing your bare, hairy chest.
